title: Has anyone brought up any issues with the new jungle aggro?
body: Try using Yi, OK so it's not an issue past like level 3, but if you use your Q it drops the aggro a little bit, if you do it enough it resets the aggro and if you are a dick head like me and forget your smite, well, that may result in the blue buff resetting whilst you are hitting it.

replies.body: Dude, Yorick jungle, His ghouls eventually reset the jungle -_- not fun

Yorick jg is overpowered. His e gives life steal per damage it does
w slows
Ult can give huge tower pushing potential

Other than the slow, not really gank material, nor end game material, really I see him as another Teemo, someone who can easily control the top lane and unless fed on CS or kills, not really useful after laning or jungling.
I just don't see the point of the new jungle changes, like why is this necessary?

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=r9tQGdQa,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-10-04T21:39:39.341+0000)
>
> I just don't see the point of the new jungle changes, like why is this necessary?

it's to make it harder for ranged champs.
you used to be able to clear red as tf at level 2 without taking any damage.

That may be fair, but why make it harder for melee champions?

It can be intentional to not Smite the blue buff after you kill the fat fucker, for, reasons.

I don't know what odd things people do, it is unfair that the things reset when you are hitting it and they are hitting you.
forgetting smite while playing yi jungle you deserve everything bad coming towards you lol srs not srs
No I deserve all the shit I can get for forgetting Smite.
the old jg used to reset while you were hitting it anyway, jg aggro was always problematic
